descriptions.download: Download your grids as a JSON file
descriptions.upload: Upload a JSON file to load your grids
descriptions.switch_dark_mode: Switch between light and dark mode
descriptions.start_create_item: Click to start creating a new area item
descriptions.end_create_item: Click to finish creating a new area item

selection.nothing_selected: You did not select an interactable element
selection.hint: Try selecting a row, column, are or item by clicking on the respective element

viewport.one_liner: Change the responsiveness of your grid
viewport.recommendation: It's recommended to not mix 'From' and 'To'. Stick to one unit type for best results.
viewport.ordering: Viewports with 'From' and 'From/ To' will be sorted in ascending order. Viewports with 'To' will be sorted in descending order.

mixed_ordering.description: When mixing viewport specifier, the order will be:

grid.one_liner: Change the width, height and auto flow of your grid
grid.hint: Changing these values to low static values may make interaction hard and may cause weird visuals
grid.hint2: You may want to select a row or column instead to change their dimensions

alignment.one_liner: Change the Alignment of the grids content and its items
alignment.items: [Justify/ Align] Items refers to the items inside the grid. Changing this will affect the individual position of the items inside their cells
alignment.content: [Justify/ Align] Content refers to the grid itself or its content as a whole. Changing this will affect the position of the items mainly if they are not taking up the full width or height of the grid
alignment.hint: Changes will probably not be visible unless you change the height and width of the grid itself

tooltip.gaps: Change the space between cells in row and column directions
tooltip.globals: Change properties that affect all grids and code generation

grid.empty_name: A grid is missing a name
grid.multiple_without_media_query: Multiple grids without a media query are not allowed
grid.multiple_with_same_media_query: Multiple grids with the same media query are not allowed
grid.upper_boundary_undefined: A Grid defines an upper boundary that is zero. It will never render
grid.boundaries_are_equal: A grid defines both its lower and upper boundary as the same value. It will almost certainly never render
grid.invalid_media_query_range: A grid defined its media query range incorrectly

area.empty_name: An area is missing a name

grid.not_all_media_queries_covered: Not all media queries are covered by grids
grid.lower_boundary_zero: A grid defines 0 as its lower boundary. Consider not using a MediaQuery at all
grid.overlapping_media_queries: Media queries overlap. This may lead to unexpected behavior

connect_area_to_grid.missing_data: Missing data for connecting area to grid
connect_area_to_grid.default: Could not connect area to grid
